alert.note: Alert for Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 18 at 8:25PM CDT until May 18 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN TAYLOR COUNTY... At 823 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles north of Thorp, or 23 miles west of Medford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Gilman and Polley now. Lublin around 835 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Polley, Gilman, The Taylor County Airport, Stetsonville, The Miller Dam Flowage, County Roads A And E and Lublin. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
